name: Essence 2200 + Magical Nights
description: Patches various lore entries to bridge the two mods. Doesn't touch balance currently.

name: Apostle studies
description: Your general knowledge and mastery of apostle magic.  Apostle magic includes any spells that fall outside of traditional Imperial doctrine. Dozens, possibly hundreds of classifications of magical schools exists.  A higher skill increases how quickly you can learn spells, and decreases their spell failure chance.  You learn this skill by studying books or spells.
